60 (31–40)% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments you inflict with Critical Strikes

72 Consecrated Ground you create applies (7–10)% increased Damage taken to Enemies

60 Damage Penetrates (5–6)% of Enemy Elemental Resistances

72 (8–12)% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

72 Grants Armour equal to (5–6)% of your Reserved Mana to you and nearby Allies

60 Every 4 seconds, Regenerate 20% of Life over one second

tiers.text_plain: 45 Nearby Enemies cannot gain Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charges

tiers.text_plain: 45 While there are at least five nearby Allies, you and nearby Allies have Onslaught

60 Exposure you inflict applies an extra (-7–-6)% to the affected Resistance

tiers.text_plain: 45 Your Hexes can affect Hexproof Enemies
